column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Farrah - Thanks for your review. I had one follow-up question for you: Have you only had our ramen as take-out? I only ask because our ramen is ideally served piping hot in a ceramic bowl. As far as noodle type is concerned
column2: we offer thick noodles in addition to the thin noodles
column3: and we're always happy to accommodate customers who prefer one over another. We also offer spinach noodles
column4: though those require a $2 upcharge. Unfortunately
column5: we do not carry fish cake per our franchisor's specifications.
